entry.title: French Wildfires Highlight Hotter Europe's Growing Challenge
entry.content: Record-setting fires across France and other parts of Europe have turned some of the continent’s most popular destinations for summer tourism into tinderboxes and highlighted the struggle to adapt to a changing climate.

entry.title: Sri Lanka's Parliament Elects New President
entry.content: Ranil Wickremesinghe is widely unpopular among Sri Lanka’s protest movement for his ties to previous leadership.

entry.title: Ukraine Targets Key Bridge, Prepares Counteroffensive in South
entry.content: Ukraine struck for the second day in a row the strategic bridge linking Russian-occupied Kherson with the rest of the Russian-held areas in southern Ukraine, part of preparations for a counteroffensive.

entry.title: Record-Breaking Heat Scorches Europe
entry.content: Extreme heat has swept through Europe over the past week, with thousands of people evacuated from their homes as wildfires broke out in swaths of the region’s south.
